6 {
7  bool GravityCompensationTutorial::initRequest(hardware_interface::RobotHW* robot_hw,
8  ros::NodeHandle& root_nh,
9  ros::NodeHandle& controller_nh,
10  ClaimedResources& claimed_resources)
11  {
12  // Check if construction finished cleanly
13  if (state_ != CONSTRUCTED)
14  {
15  ROS_ERROR("Cannot initialize this controller because it failed to be constructed");
16  return false;
17  }
18 
19  // Get a pointer to the joint effort control interface
20  hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface* effort_iface =
21  robot_hw->get<hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface>();
22 
23  if (!effort_iface)
24  {
25  ROS_ERROR("This controller requires a hardware interface of type EffortJointInterface."
26  " Make sure this is registered in the hardware_interface::RobotHW class.");
27  return false;
28  }
29 
30  // Get a pointer to the joint position control interface
31  hardware_interface::JointStateInterface* joint_state_iface =
32  robot_hw->get<hardware_interface::JointStateInterface>();
33  if (!joint_state_iface)
34  {
35  ROS_ERROR("This controller requires a hardware interface of type JointStateInterface."
36  " Make sure this is registered in the hardware_interface::RobotHW class.");
37  return false;
38  }
39 
40  // Clear resources associated at both interfaces
41  effort_iface->clearClaims();
42  joint_state_iface->clearClaims();
43 
44 
45  if (!init(effort_iface, joint_state_iface, root_nh, controller_nh))
46  {
47  ROS_ERROR("Failed to initialize the controller");
48  return false;
49  }
50 
51  // Saves the resources claimed by this controller
52  claimed_resources.push_back(hardware_interface::InterfaceResources(
53  hardware_interface::internal::demangledTypeName<hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface>(),
54  effort_iface->getClaims()));
55  effort_iface->clearClaims();
56 
57  // Changes state to INITIALIZED
58  state_ = INITIALIZED;
59  return true;
60  }
61 
62  bool GravityCompensationTutorial::init(hardware_interface::EffortJointInterface* effort_iface,
63  hardware_interface::JointStateInterface* joint_state_iface,
64  ros::NodeHandle& /*root_nh*/, ros::NodeHandle& control_nh)
65  {
66  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Loading public gravity compensation controller");
67 
68  // Check int the param server if subchains specified
69  std::vector<std::string> tip_links;
70  control_nh.getParam("robot_model_chains", tip_links);
71 
72  std::vector<double> joint_position_min;
73  std::vector<double> joint_position_max;
74  std::vector<double> joint_vel_min;
75  std::vector<double> joint_vel_max;
76  std::vector<double> joint_damping;
77  std::vector<double> joint_friction;
78  std::vector<double> joint_max_effort;
79 
80  if (tip_links.size() > 0)
81  {
82  // Parse the robot if subchains specified
83  RigidBodyDynamics::Addons::URDFReadFromParamServer(
84  &rbdl_model_, RigidBodyDynamics::FloatingBaseType::FixedBase, tip_links,
85  joint_names_, joint_position_min, joint_position_max, joint_vel_min,
86  joint_vel_max, joint_damping, joint_friction, joint_max_effort);
87  }
88  else
89  {
90  // Parse the full robot if there is no subchain specified
91  RigidBodyDynamics::Addons::URDFReadFromParamServer(
92  &rbdl_model_, RigidBodyDynamics::FloatingBaseType::FixedBase, joint_names_,
93  joint_position_min, joint_position_max, joint_vel_min, joint_vel_max,
94  joint_damping, joint_friction, joint_max_effort);
95  }
96 
97  for (size_t i = 0; i < joint_names_.size(); i++)
98  {
99  // Checks joint type from param server
100  std::string control_type;
101  if (!control_nh.getParam("joints/" + joint_names_[i] + "/type", control_type))
102  {
103  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not find joint " << joint_names_[i] << " interface type");
104  return false;
105  }
106 
107  if (control_type == "actuated") // If joint is actuated
108  {
109  // Read the actuator parameters from param server
110  ActuatorParameters actuator_parameters;
111  if (!control_nh.getParam("joints/" + joint_names_[i] + "/motor_torque_constant",
112  actuator_parameters.motor_torque_constant))
113  {
114  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not find motor torque constant for joint " << joint_names_[i]);
115  return false;
116  }
117  if (!control_nh.getParam("joints/" + joint_names_[i] + "/reduction_ratio",
118  actuator_parameters.reduction_ratio))
119  {
120  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not find reduction ratio for joint " << joint_names_[i]);
121  return false;
122  }
123 
124  // Reads the optional gravity compensation parameters
125  GravityCompensationParameters friction_parameters;
126  if (!control_nh.getParam("viscous_friction", friction_parameters.viscous_friction))
127  ROS_WARN_STREAM("No viscous friction defined for joint "
128  << joint_names_[i] << ". Setting it to 0.0");
129  if (!control_nh.getParam("velocity_tolerance", friction_parameters.velocity_tolerance))
130  ROS_WARN_STREAM("No velocity tolerance defined for joint "
131  << joint_names_[i] << ". Setting it to 0.0");
132  if (!control_nh.getParam("static_friction", friction_parameters.static_friction))
133  ROS_WARN_STREAM("No static friction defined for joint "
134  << joint_names_[i] << ". Setting it to 0.0");
135 
136  try
137  {
138  // Try to get an effort interface handle to command the joint in effort
139  joint_types_.insert(std::make_pair(joint_names_[i], JointType::ACTUATED));
140  hardware_interface::JointHandle joint_handle =
141  effort_iface->getHandle(joint_names_[i]);
142  // Creates an actuated joint and insert in the map of actuated joints
143  ActuatedJoint actuated_joint;
144  actuated_joint.joint_handle = joint_handle;
145  actuated_joint.actuator_parameters = actuator_parameters;
146  actuated_joint.friction_parameters = friction_parameters;
147  actuated_joints_.insert(std::make_pair(joint_names_[i], actuated_joint));
148  }
149  catch (...)
150  {
151  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not find joint " << joint_names_[i] << " with Effort interface");
152  return false;
153  }
154  }
155  else // If static joint
156  {
157  try
158  {
159  // Try to get a joint state handle which only allows us to read the current states of the joint
160  joint_types_.insert(std::make_pair(joint_names_[i], JointType::STATIC));
161  hardware_interface::JointStateHandle joint_state_handle =
162  joint_state_iface->getHandle(joint_names_[i]);
163  // Insert this handle in the map of static joints
164  static_joints_.insert(std::make_pair(joint_names_[i], joint_state_handle));
165  }
166  catch (...)
167  {
168  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not find joint " << joint_names_[i]
169  << " with Position interface");
170  return false;
171  }
172  }
173  }
174 
175  assert(joint_types_.size() == joint_names_.size());
176  assert(joint_types_.size() == actuated_joints_.size() + static_joints_.size());
177 
178  // Iinitializa q_act_, q_zero_, tau_cmd_
179  q_act_.resize(joint_names_.size());
180  q_zero_.resize(joint_names_.size());
181  tau_cmd_.resize(joint_names_.size());
182 
183  q_act_.setZero();
184  q_zero_.setZero();
185  tau_cmd_.setZero();
186 
187  // Allows to modify the gravity compensation parameters from the rqt reconfigure
188  for (auto it = actuated_joints_.begin(); it != actuated_joints_.end(); it++)
189  {
190  ddr_.reset(new ddynamic_reconfigure::DDynamicReconfigure(control_nh));
191  ddr_->RegisterVariable(&it->second.friction_parameters.viscous_friction,
192  it->first + "/viscous_friction_gain");
193  ddr_->RegisterVariable(&it->second.friction_parameters.static_friction,
194  it->first + "/static_friction_gain");
195  ddr_->RegisterVariable(&it->second.friction_parameters.velocity_tolerance,
196  it->first + "/velocity_tolerance_gain");
197  ddr_->PublishServicesTopics();
198  }
199 
200  return true;
201  }
202 
203  void GravityCompensationTutorial::update(const ros::Time& time, const ros::Duration& period)
204  {
205  // Read the current position of all the joints
206  for (size_t i = 0; i < joint_names_.size(); ++i)
207  {
208  if (joint_types_[joint_names_[i]] == JointType::ACTUATED)
209  q_act_[i] = actuated_joints_[joint_names_[i]].joint_handle.getPosition();
210  else
211  q_act_[i] = static_joints_[joint_names_[i]].getPosition();
212  }
213 
214  // Calculate the minimum torque to maintain the robot at the current position
215  tau_cmd_.setZero();
216  RigidBodyDynamics::InverseDynamics(rbdl_model_, q_act_, q_zero_, q_zero_, tau_cmd_);
217 
218  // For all the joints...
219  for (size_t i = 0; i < joint_names_.size(); ++i)
220  {
221  // ...check those one that are actuated
222  if (joint_types_[joint_names_[i]] == JointType::ACTUATED)
223  {
224  // Translate the calculated torque to desired effort by integrating the frictions of the motor + the ger ration + motor constants
225  ActuatedJoint& actuated_joint = actuated_joints_[joint_names_[i]];
226  double desired_torque = tau_cmd_[i];
227  double actual_velocity = actuated_joint.joint_handle.getVelocity();
228 
229  desired_torque += actuated_joint.friction_parameters.viscous_friction * actual_velocity;
230  if (actual_velocity > actuated_joint.friction_parameters.velocity_tolerance)
231  desired_torque += actuated_joint.friction_parameters.static_friction;
232  else
233  desired_torque -= actuated_joint.friction_parameters.static_friction;
234 
235  double desired_effort =
236  desired_torque / (actuated_joint.actuator_parameters.motor_torque_constant *
237  actuated_joint.actuator_parameters.reduction_ratio);
238 
239  if (std::isnan(desired_effort)) // If desired effort is not valid
240  {
241  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Desired effort is not valid for joint "
242  << joint_names_[i] << " = " << desired_effort);
243  return;
244  }
245  else
246  {
247  // Command an effort to the joint via ros_cotrol interface
248  actuated_joint.joint_handle.setCommand(desired_effort);
249  };
250  }
251  }
252  }

254  void GravityCompensationTutorial::starting(const ros::Time& time)
255  {
256  }
257 
258  void GravityCompensationTutorial::stopping(const ros::Time& time)
259  {
260  // Set desired effort to zero for the actuated joints
261  for (auto it = actuated_joints_.begin(); it != actuated_joints_.end();)
262  {
263  it->second.joint_handle.setCommand(0);
264  }
265  }
266 }
